ch.fhnw.mdt.forthdebugger.communication

Class ProcessCommunicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.fhnw.mdt.forthdebugger.communication.ProcessCommunicator

  • public class ProcessCommunicator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which is able to communicate via ProcessCommunicator.Commands with a process. The typical use case is sending a command and waiting for its result.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ProcessCommunicator.Command
      Represents a command which can be sent to the process.
      static interface  ProcessCommunicator.CommandCompleted
      Callback when ProcessCommunicator.WaitFor await has completed.
      static interface  ProcessCommunicator.CommandTimedOutListener
      Callback called after a request has timed out.
      static class  ProcessCommunicator.CommandTimeOutException
      Exception thrown when a ProcessCommunicator.Command sent to the ProcessCommunicator has timed out.
      static interface  ProcessCommunicator.LineListener
      Callback after a whole line has been read from the reader.
      static class  ProcessCommunicator.WaitFor
      Abstract base class for all possible ProcessCommunicator.WaitFor classes.
      static class  ProcessCommunicator.WaitForMatch
      Waits for the line to match the given String.
      static class  ProcessCommunicator.WaitForResult
      Waits for the given String result.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCommandTimeOutListener(ProcessCommunicator.CommandTimedOutListener listener)
      Adds the given ProcessCommunicator.CommandTimedOutListener callback which will get called when a command has timed out.
      void addLineListener(ProcessCommunicator.LineListener lineListener)
      Adds the given ProcessCommunicator.LineListener callback.
      void awaitCommandCompletion()
      Awaits until the command queue has been completed, meaning all commands have been written and if necessary received their results.
      void awaitReadCompletion()
      Awaits until the reader has read everything from its current buffer.
      void awaitShutdown()
      Blocks until the ProcessCommunicator has shutdown via shutdown().
      void forwardOutput(java.io.OutputStream out)
      Forwards the output from the reader to the given OutputStream.

      Returns the line which is currently being read.

      Returns the last read line.

      Returns the line read at the given index.
      int getNumberOfReadLines()
      Returns the number of lines which have been read since this reader has been started.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getReadLines()
      Returns a copy of all read lines.
      ProcessCommunicator.WaitForMatch newWaitForMatchLater(java.lang.String regex)
      Creates a ProcessCommunicator.WaitForMatch object which can be used to wait for a given match from the forth process reader at a later time.
      ProcessCommunicator.WaitForResult newWaitForResultLater(java.lang.String result)
      Creates a ProcessCommunicator.WaitForResult object which can be used to wait for a given result from the forth process reader at a later time.
      void sendCommand(int command)
      Sends the given command and immediately returns.
      void sendCommand(java.lang.String command)
      Sends the given command and immediately returns.
      void sendCommandAwaitResult(int command, ProcessCommunicator.WaitFor waitFor)
      Sends the given command and blocks until the process has returned the result expected by the given ProcessCommunicator.WaitFor.
      void sendCommandAwaitResult(java.lang.String command, ProcessCommunicator.WaitFor waitFor)
      Sends the given command and blocks until the process has returned the result expected by the given ProcessCommunicator.WaitFor.
      void sendCommandForResult(int command, ProcessCommunicator.WaitFor waitFor, ProcessCommunicator.CommandCompleted commandCompleted)
      Sends the given command and returns immediately.
      void sendCommandForResult(java.lang.String command, ProcessCommunicator.WaitFor waitFor, ProcessCommunicator.CommandCompleted commandCompleted)
      Sends the given command and returns immediately.
      void shutdown()
      Shuts down the ProcessCommunicator and also closes the underlying Process.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProcessCommunicator

    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down the ProcessCommunicator and also closes the underlying Process. Notifies all thread which are waiting for shutdown by calling awaitShutdown(). If the ProcessCommunicator has already been shut down this method returns immediately.

        Waiting Threads

      • awaitShutdown

        public void awaitShutdown()
        Blocks until the ProcessCommunicator has shutdown via shutdown().

      • sendCommand

      • addCommandTimeOutListener

        Parameters:
        listener -

      • awaitCommandCompletion

        public void awaitCommandCompletion()
                            throws ProcessCommunicator.CommandTimeOutException
        Awaits until the command queue has been completed, meaning all commands have been written and if necessary received their results. Note that this does not mean that the result is ready to process unless an appropriate ProcessCommunicator.WaitFor has been supplied to the command.
        Throws:
        ProcessCommunicator.CommandTimeOutException

      • getNumberOfReadLines

        public int getNumberOfReadLines()
        Returns the number of lines which have been read since this reader has been started.
        Returns:

        Returns the last read line.

      • getReadLines

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getReadLines()
        Returns a copy of all read lines.
        Returns:

      • getCurrentLine

        public java.lang.String getCurrentLine()
        Returns the line which is currently being read. This line might not be complete, so be careful using it.
        Returns:

      • forwardOutput

        public void forwardOutput(java.io.OutputStream out)
        Forwards the output from the reader to the given OutputStream. Note that caller must make sure the stream gets closed correctly.
        Parameters:
        out -

      • newWaitForResultLater

        public ProcessCommunicator.WaitForResult newWaitForResultLater(java.lang.String result)
        Creates a ProcessCommunicator.WaitForResult object which can be used to wait for a given result from the forth process reader at a later time. Call ProcessCommunicator.WaitFor.await() to wait.
        Parameters:
        result -
        Returns:

      • newWaitForMatchLater

        public ProcessCommunicator.WaitForMatch newWaitForMatchLater(java.lang.String regex)
        Creates a ProcessCommunicator.WaitForMatch object which can be used to wait for a given match from the forth process reader at a later time. Call ProcessCommunicator.WaitFor.await() to wait.
        Parameters:
        result -
        Returns:

        Adds the given ProcessCommunicator.LineListener callback.
        Parameters:
        lineListener -

      • awaitReadCompletion

        public void awaitReadCompletion()
        Awaits until the reader has read everything from its current buffer. Immediately returns if there is nothing to read.
